On timing: we expect to have a clearer outcome on the higher-priority conversations within the next few rounds. While we can’t guarantee a specific round, our current plan is to reassess the remaining place around rounds 13–15 and proceed accordingly.

On a conditional/hold offer: we’re not able to make a conditional reservation that would commit the place ahead of families who are higher on our internal priority list. What we *can* do is move quickly if/when we reach the point where the place is still unfilled after those discussions—given your readiness to confirm the same day, we would contact you promptly at that point.

If you don’t hear from us before then, you’re welcome to message again around round 13–15 to check status, and we will give you the most up-to-date position we can.
